bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with shen lao 腎勞 , kidney exhaustion. Yao xing lun 藥性論 Substance Entry zhi mu 知母： 主治心煩躁悶，骨熱勞往來，生產後蓐勞，腎氣勞，憎寒虛損 , “It is responsible for curing heart vexation, restlessness and heart-pressure, recurring bone heat and exhaustion, childbed exhaustion following delivery, kidney qi exhaustion , aversion to cold, and depletion detriment”.
